body_html:
I've been trying to figure out what this check is meant to prevent, and I think here's a case:

a = Variable(torch.randn(2, 3))
b = a[:]
b.requires_grad = True
a.add_(5)
b.sum().backward()

This is caused by the fact that views require grad if the base does, but not visa-versa.

body:
I've been trying to figure out what this check is meant to prevent, and I think here's a case:
```
a = Variable(torch.randn(2, 3))
b = a[:]
b.requires_grad = True
a.add_(5)
b.sum().backward()
```

This is caused by the fact that views require grad if the base does, but not visa-versa.
